sections.heading: interest; subject to claims of creditors
sections.text: The subjection to the claims of creditors of a future interest, whether legal or equitable, is not prevented or avoided on the sole ground that such interest is future or contingent.SourceLaws 1941, c. 153, § 8, p. 596;C.S.Supp.,1941, § 76-1008;R.S.1943, § 76

76-108.Future interest; subject to claims of creditors.

The subjection to the claims of creditors of a future interest, whether legal or equitable, is not prevented or avoided on the sole ground that such interest is future or contingent.

SourceLaws 1941, c. 153, § 8, p. 596;C.S.Supp.,1941, § 76-1008;R.S.1943, § 76-108.
